729600.name: Malzbie's Pinball Collection - Carnival Table
729600.description:
Carnival Pinball
Come in and enjoy!
All the attractions and stalls want to be visited. Eat, drink, play the high striker, ride the Ferris wheel, ride roller coasters and meet the clowns at the shooting gallery. You can activate something new at almost any of the attractions.
Collect multiballs by throwing cans, at the balloon stall, from the clowns and in the cave and allow for up to 7 balls to be played at the same time.
Activate CARNIVAL and play with all balls for the highest high score in the world!

  • Fast game
  • Four different and combinable multiballs with up to 7 balls at the same time.
  • Variable playing field
729600.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙
*具有完全音频支持的语言
